job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Engineer for Training AI Data - Python, Dutch Language
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You'll join an expert annotation team to create training data for the world's most advanced AI models. No previous AI experience is necessary. You'll get your foot in the door with one of the most prominent players in the AI/LLM space today. We seek software engineers with 3+ years of experience to train large AI language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. We currently have 200+ roles open!, * If you seem like a good fit, we'll send an async RLHF code review that will take 35 minutes and must be finished within 72 hours of us sending it.
     * You'll receive credentials to the RLHF platform. We'll then set up a group call to answer any further questions about onboarding with the company.
     * You'll perform a simulated production-level task (RLHF task) on the platform. This will be your final interview, which will ultimately determine your employment and leveling. Successful completion of this process provides you with an opportunity to work on projects as they become available.
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer for Training AI Data - Python, Dutch Language

You'll join an expert annotation team to create training data for the world's most advanced AI models. No previous AI experience is necessary. You'll get your foot in the door with one of the most prominent players in the AI/LLM space today. We seek software engineers with 3+ years of experience to train large AI language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. We currently have 200+ roles open!, * If you seem like a good fit, we'll send an async RLHF code review that will take 35 minutes and must be finished within 72 hours of us sending it.
     * You'll receive credentials to the RLHF platform. We'll then set up a group call to answer any further questions about onboarding with the company.
     * You'll perform a simulated production-level task (RLHF task) on the platform. This will be your final interview, which will ultimately determine your employment and leveling. Successful completion of this process provides you with an opportunity to work on projects as they become available.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data annotation and human feedback for AI models, rather than core AI/ML engineering tasks like model development or MLOps. While it mentions training AI models, the primary role appears to be data preparation and evaluation, not building or deploying them.

phrases: helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code
engaging with these models as they learn to code
perform a simulated production-level task (RLHF task)
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'train large AI language models', 'generative AI models write better code', and 'engaging with these models as they learn to code' directly relate to the process of model training and refinement. The mention of RLHF (Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback) is a specific technique used in training and fine-tuning generative models.
The job title itself, 'Software Engineer', indicates a requirement for software development skills, even if the primary focus is on data annotation for AI.

phrases: No previous AI experience is necessary
You'll get your foot in the door with one of the most prominent players in the AI/LLM space today
soft_skills.justification: The statement 'No previous AI experience is necessary' implies a willingness to train individuals and that the role involves learning on the job. The mention of joining a 'prominent player' suggests an opportunity for growth and learning within the AI/LLM field.

phrases: Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code
async RLHF code review that will take 35 minutes and must be finished within 72 hours
soft_skills.justification: The description of projects as 'discrete, highly variable problems' suggests a need for problem-solving skills. The timed RLHF code review indicates a need for efficient and pragmatic execution of tasks.

phrases: Successful completion of this process provides you with an opportunity to work on projects as they become available.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on a 'simulated production-level task' as the final interview and the opportunity to 'work on projects as they become available' suggests a results-oriented environment where initiative and successful task completion are valued.
